author: jacopoc
msg: Improved and completed implementation of automatic gl postings for payment and applications and added new demo accounts and mappings to show the new feature available:
it is now possible to generate separate gl transactions for payments and for payment applications.
Based on initial suggestions from Scott Gray and Anil Patel.
- removed a duplicated gl account type (PREPAID_EXPENSES)
- fixed a typo in a description of an account of the demo chart of accounts

author: buscob
msg: Extended example TabBar menus from the CommonTabBarMenu.

author: dbaum
msg: reformat code using felix eclipse template. FELIX-1953.
